On Thursday, Elon Musk unveiled the latest production model from Tesla motors,...
The Model 3 will be the least expensive electric car from the company.
Adding that Tesla doesn't make slow cars,...
...Musk said that the base Model 3 will accelerate from zero to 60 miles per hour...
Although the models shown by Musk during an event...
...at the company's design studio were prototypes,...
...the Model 3 is expected to go on sale at the end of 2017.
